choices.B: The high watermark of software usage
choices.A: The sum of usage for a selected data
choices.E: The sum of usage on a monthly basis
choices.C: The sum of usage on a weekly basis
choices.D: The sum of usage since installation date

questions.question_text: What does a usage record track?

discussion.content: E - per the SAM Book A Software Usage Record tracks the sum of usage on a monthly basis.

comments.content:
Isn't this just for Microsoft SCCM, though? https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/sccm-software-usage.html

I am thinking it's A based on: Total Usage Time (default) as found here: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/t_AddAReclamationRule.html

A Usage Record is not specific to any one Publisher or product, it can be applied for multiple, so I believe this is answer A as it's more generic.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
The answer is E - a usage record tracks the sum of software usage on a monthly basis
This is from page 393 in the SAM book from the SAM course.

choices.D: What else can you tell me about yourself?
choices.C: How should I classify you specifically?
choices.A: Are you there? How will I classify you?

questions.question_text: Within ServiceNow Discovery, the Classification phase determines what?

discussion.content: Answer is A. Large amounts of data - use Discovery, Medium - use import, small - use manual

Selected Answer: A
A is correct

questions.question_text: When loading a large amount of software installation data, which is the best method to use?

discussion.content: Answer is C - Per Named User - Licenses a specific user for a number of installations of software.

choices.C: A specific user for a number of installations of software
choices.A: A user for a number of installations of software
choices.E: A specific device for a number of installations of software
choices.B: A device for a number of installations of software
choices.D: Cores on a physical server or virtual machine

questions.question_text: The Per Named User license metric licenses which of the following?
What type of record is only created when a software model or entitlement exists for the product?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
From SAM on-demand course: "A software model results record is only created when a software model or entitlement exists for the product."
